messages.message: do we have the ability to create a metaflow with a subset of the flows specified in the flow folder?
Not sure exactly what you mean. Do you mean what it takes to run a metaflow with only a subset of the classes considered?
basically, we want to make a bunch of metaflows compiled that only have 1 class in each (instead of the 5 classes in the `flows` folder)

Got it. That'd be a new feature we'd have to add to the frontend. Makes sense though to have a selector where you can choose which flows to export @Eric Han to help triage and add it to the feature list board
does the backend already support it david? or you just mean it only involves frontend changes?

I think this would require changes on both ends. Changes on backend are not too hard, though. Right now, we’re just listing the directory and getting all the flow files, so if we’re passed a list of the ones we want to include, it would be pretty easy to change.

filed a story (feel free to change it to a task or edit it however), but if you could link other issues or post updates here, it would help us track it: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-233 cc @Eric Han @Jonathan Shih
@Chetan what exactly is this for? and when do they need it by?
not urgent — just wanted it to be added to the feature request list
I mean...if we had it in the next 53min, we would use it for a noon call with BofA @Jonathan Shih :smile:
hahahaha don’t think we can even push that fast xD
